title: 萌新想问一下 怎么快速获取金粒啊qwq
author: Erweidu
txt_content: 大佬们指条路 谢谢啦

replies.author: ranick
replies.txt_content: 多发帖、多水经验（用意义地水）

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content: 完成任务，水帖，恰锭

replies.author: nn虾米nn
replies.txt_content: 像你这样水贴金粒就会多

replies.author: 依喏嗨~
replies.txt_content: 多泡茶嘛 你懂的

replies.author: 梦回三国a
replies.txt_content: 每天多氵铁，慢慢就多了

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content: 没办法，只能水贴。我现在都不够了。

replies.author: qingchengv587
replies.txt_content: 完成任务。发帖回帖

replies.author: MCxiaoliujun
replies.txt_content: 水咯 还能怎么办？

replies.author: Spider_Queen
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Maki_Best
replies.txt_content: 多水贴，多发主题（雾）不要灌水。

replies.author: 落幕ovo
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: CrazyPeanut
replies.txt_content: 做每日任务呀

replies.author: Doogan
replies.txt_content: 当水怪 是唯一的出路

replies.author: 琉璃天蝎
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: iezhaowomafan
replies.txt_content: 同问，请问什么时候能用搜索呀

replies.author: Epoch丶风云
replies.txt_content: 多完成任务。多看看帖子回复

replies.author: mc江湖
replies.txt_content: 水

replies.author: qq15015911125
replies.txt_content: 我告诉你，多发帖子，但是不能水，会封号禁言的

replies.author: MC小利
replies.txt_content: 完成任务，水帖，恰锭

replies.author: 星辰坊-STAR
replies.txt_content: 这一个个回复的不都是在水贴嘛
创个小号【疯狂水，互相水】

replies.author: 可怕的大佬
replies.txt_content: 多水贴 + 签到 +出教程+回复+枪锭=大佬
除了发帖，回复，其他我也不清楚

replies.author: Entaven
replies.txt_content: 发帖 回帖 少灌水

replies.author: junjun12321
replies.txt_content: 回帖呗，收锭呗，水贴呗，问就是三连

replies.author: 小鑫emm
replies.txt_content: 快速获得是大佬才会干 萌新就评论和发贴就得了

replies.author: w841488655
replies.txt_content: 多在论坛活跃，回帖，做任务（不要灌水）

replies.author: xiaoxuandada
replies.txt_content: 多多水就行了嘿嘿

replies.author: xKsyStudio
replies.txt_content: 多发帖 多回帖 多做任务

replies.author: lanyou66
replies.txt_content: 我只想知道怎么快速升级 ....
